title: Please help me fix my LoL.
body: Okay, so over the past three days, my league has been doing this thing where when I am in the loading screen to go into a game, my cursor doesn't change to the LoL glove, and remains as the window cursor, therefore I cant move, buy items, upgrade my abilities, etc. This problem is also affecting me in the way that I will go into a game expecting the problem to be fixed, and I have to open task manager and force close the game, which causes the game to think I am AFK, which has now caused me to be put into lower priority game queue. I have repaired the game through the sign in menu, and have even uninstalled and reinstalled the game, which only worked for one game, then it broke again. Does anyone know what is causing this, or know what I can do to fix this issue? Because I would really just like to enjoy some LoL lmao :/

replies.body: Do you have any overlays active? (Discord, Overwolf etc etc). If so disable or update them. Usually this sort of behaviour is the result of something over the top of your League window (like an overlay) not working as intended.

Hey, Chris from Overwolf here :)
This issue doesn't look like it could be related to Overwolf, but our support team would love to help you make sure of that. Feel free to contact us at support@overwolf.com and we'll have a look!
It was a known issue with discord overlay this time (was apparently happening with Overwatch as well). In their latest patch notes it's supposedly fixed so time will tell.
Dude, I'm literally having the EXACT same problem. And I've repaired/reinstalled too but it doesn't solve it.
Seras Dragon has it right. I closed my Discord and it fixed it.
I have this problem on mac. what i do to fix it is to tab into the overlay click on the tab then go back into the game and click anywhere. That should change it to the lol curser. I hope this helps!
Sorry i don't have a solution but my friend is having the exact same issue. Perhaps if we make enough noise this will get some attention
